member.name: M:NStructuredDataModel.AbstractNode.TryGetAsArray(System.Object[]@)
member.summary: Attempts to get the children of the current node as an array. This will happen only if there are keys that represent sequential numbers starting at zero.
member.param: The array of child items that have keys that represent sequential numbers.
member.returns: True, if an array could be obtained from the child nodes; otherwise false.

member.name: M:NStructuredDataModel.AbstractNode.GetPropertyParentNode(System.Collections.Generic.ICollection{System.String})
member.summary: Returns the parent of a property path in the Variable. If parts of the property tree do not exist, then they will be created.
